Operation.Name: GetLastState
Operation.CommandText: select top 1 fuelLevel, speed, changeOil, latitude, longitude, stateTime from carsState_table where carId = @id order by stateTime desc )

Operation.Name: GetStateHistory
Operation.CommandText: select fuelLevel, speed, changeOil, latitude, longitude, stateTime from carsState_table where carId = @id and stateTime between @start and @end order by stateTime
